name: BubbleGum (NEMblCH)
description:
Do you want me to tell you a story?
One day the bubble gum and the bubble princess fell in love. But the bubble king was against such an alliance. He did not want the pure genus of bubbles mixed with some kind of gum and hid his daughter so that no one would find her.
Can our brave bubble gum overcome difficulties and meet his love?

REMEMBER: 
When you throw a bubble gum it becomes more purple and is able to kill the enemy, but if before that our hero collides with anything, then the effect will disappear.

CONTROL:
Left mouse button - hold to reinforce the throw, release to throw;
Space - inflate and fall more slowly;

Created for Mini Jam 84
Theme: Bubbles
Limitation: You are your own ammo
